title: C++: The Object-Oriented Evolution of C
content: Building on the foundation of C, Bjarne Stroustrup created C++ in 1983. This language introduced object-oriented programming principles such as classes, inheritance, and polymorphism, which transformed software engineering. C++ remains a favorite for developing high-performance applications, including games, operating systems, and real-time systems. Its rich feature set and unmatched control make it ideal for performance-critical applications.
